function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Customers shifting towards online shopping due to COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Decreased social interaction and increased adoption of technology for pre-ordering and in-store delivery","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to ensure safe and hygienic in-store shopping experiences","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, virtual queuing, self-checkout kiosks","People":"Customers, retail staff","Owner":"Retailers, technology providers"}]}
